transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello good afternoon, ma'am.
Customer: Kya good afternoon.
Executive: Ma'am Shadaab bol raha hu IndiaMART account manager.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ma'am isse pehle hamara discussion hua tha buyleads ke regarding, toh maine ma'am buyleads bhi show kare the.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Uske baad ma'am ye hai ki buyleads consume... Sorry.
Executive: Ma'am uske baad bhi ye hai ki buyleads consume nahi hui.
Customer: [unintelligible] add bhi karte hai, wo bhi karte hai, aur mera number de rakha hai, toh bhi WhatsApp me join karte hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Dekhiye revert back number se mai aapko call back kar sakti hu same number pe?
Executive: Nahi ma'am jo maine pehle number aapko share karwaya tha na, us number pe aap revert back kariye, wo mera personal number hai.
Customer: Accha, theek hai, mai aapko 10 minute me call back karungi.
Executive: Okay ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads not being consumed.

- Wants to call back on the same number.



Resolution:

- Asked to revert on the previously shared number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, call back, personal number
